Show History

Select Actions | Show History to review the historical information about a single versioned file, multiple versioned files, an entire project, or an entire project database.

Field Descriptions

General Tab
Report Type Select a type of report to generate:
  • Full: Display both an archive summary and a revision summary.
  • File information only: Display only an archive summary.
  • Revision information only: Display only a revision summary.
  • List locked revisions: Display information about currently locked revisions, including the archive name, user ID of the locker, revisions locked, and check-in revision numbers.
  • List revisions with version label: Display information about revisions associated with the version label shown in the Label field.
  • List revisions in group: Display information about revisions associated with the promotion group shown in the Group field.
  • List newest revisions: Display the revision numbers of all trunk tip revisions.
  • Check tips against version/revision: Display the names of files whose tip revisions do not correspond to the version label, promotion group, or revision number shown in the Revision entry field.
Revision Generate a report for one specific revision, as opposed to all revisions of the versioned file, by clicking the Browse button to select a revision number, a version label, or a promotion group. If selecting the revision by a version label, enter a backslash before a version label that begins with a numeric character (such as \1.2label).
Include files in subproject (This field is only visible when a project or project database is selected.) Select to report on all versioned files in the subprojects of the selected project or project database.
Advanced Tab (you can use any two of the following to restrict the report)
Author(s) Limit the report output to revisions modified by the specified user(s). If you are entering more than one User, separate the Users with a comma.
Locker(s) Limit the report output to revisions or archives locked by the specified user(s). If you are entering more than one User, separate the Users with a comma.
Owner(s) Limit the report output to archives created by the specified user(s). If you are entering more than one User, separate the Users with a comma.
Date Range From Select the earliest date of a revision that the report should include. Click the browse button to display a calendar. Select a date by selecting a month and year and then clicking the date on the calendar.
Date Range To Select the latest date of a revision that the report should include. Click the browse button to display a calendar. Select a date by selecting a month and year and then clicking the date on the calendar.
Selected Files Tab
Review the selected files for which a report will be generated.
Properties button Click the Properties button to display archive information for the versioned file or project.

See Also
